description: Heavy use of internet slang and abbreviations (lmk, ur, idk, b4, obvi, prolly, tbh, rn, ttyl). One mockup review meeting on Wednesday at 1 PM.

events.title: Mockup Review
events.reasoning: Alice and Carol agree to meet Wednesday afternoon at 1 PM in the design lab to review mockups before a client call. Duration is approximately 2 hours.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 1 event: mockup review Wednesday at 1 PM for 2 hours in the design lab.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'wed' is 2026-02-25. Tests parsing through heavy slang: lmk, ur, idk, b4, obvi, prolly, tbh, rn, ttyl.
